metadata.dc:description: We report a case of hemorrhage into the abdominal cavity due to the rupture of an intestinal cavernous hemangioma. Out of the 30 published cases from 1976 to 1993 dealing with hemangioma of the small intestine, none presented with intraperitoneal bleeding.
metadata.dc:title: Hemorragia intraperitoneal por hemangioma cavernoso de intestino delgado.
[Intraperitoneal hemorrhage caused by cavernous hemangioma of the small intestine].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
